items.title: Intel Sustainability and Flower Shop Redesign
items.description: Led the redesign of two distinct web experiences: an Intel sustainability timeline and a flower shop website. Focused on clean layouts, responsive design, and balanced branding elements to highlight both corporate responsibility initiatives and local community charm.

items.title: Minders
items.description: An in-development task management app for iOS and Apple Watch focused on ADHD-friendly feedback and overload reduction.

items.title: Roamway
items.description: A smart, personal itinerary builder app for iOS and iPadOS. Coming soon to the App Store.

items.title: Nevada EMPOWER Website
items.description: Working alongside one other developer, I migrated the entire codebase to React and TypeScript, ensuring type safety and maintainability. I then drove a full design overhaul—realigning the site with brand standards, enhancing responsiveness, and improving accessibility—ultimately boosting developer velocity and enabling smoother feature development.

items.title: Frog King Game
items.description: A mobile game app for iOS and Android where players help a frog king reclaim his throne by solving puzzles and completing challenges. Developed using React Native and Expo.

links.title: Hangman
links.description: My first personal project — a JS/CSS Hangman game, later updated for responsive mobile use.
